original_text: So they sent a message with the king's command to all the people. They sent the message everywhere in Israel, from Beersheba to Dan. The message told the people to come to Jerusalem for the Passover festival to worship the Lord, Israel's God. Before that, they had not brought all the people together for the festival, as God's law taught them to do.
korean_text: 드디어 왕이 명령을 내려 브엘세바에서부터 단까지 온 이스라엘에 공포하여 일제히 예루살렘으로 와서 이스라엘 하나님 여호와의 유월절을 지키라 하니 이는 기록한 규례대로 오랫동안 지키지 못하였음이더라

sentences.original_text: with the king's command to all the people
They sent the message everywhere in Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이스라엘 온 땅에 메시지를 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: The message told the people to come to Jerusalem
Before that, they had not brought all the people together
sentences.korean_translation: 그 전에, 그들은 모든 백성을 한자리에 모으지 않았었고

sentences.original_text: as God's law taught them to do
